dcterms:creator: H. Hussain
J. J. Maliyakal
D. Philip
O. Yadav
dcterms:description: This dataset includes all of Shakespeare’s plays, organized for text analysis or NLP tasks. It provides detailed location information for each line within the play’s structure, identifies the specific Shakespearean play, and names the character speaking the line. The dataset can be used for studying Shakespeare’s writing style, performing textual analysis, and training machine learning models for tasks like text generation or sentiment analysis.
dcterms:title: Shakespeare Plays

dcterms:creator: Kris
dcterms:description: The Nietzsche Texts dataset is a comprehensive collection of English text specifically designed for natural language processing and text generation tasks. It is recommended for educational and experimental use, as LSTM networks are well-suited for learning sequences and patterns in text.
dcterms:title: Nietzsche Texts
